SubjectDeposit: Well done! You have created an order!
MessageDeposit:
Well done! You have created an order on your account %account%.
Here is an overview of your order:

Euro Deposit:				%eurodeposit%
Bitcoin Price:				%bitcoinprice%
Aprox. Bitcoin to receive:	%aproxbitcoinrcv%
Order Timeout:			%ordertimeout% Minutes


Vires in Numeris!
SubjectWithdraw: Well done! You have stacked some sats!
MessageWithdraw:
Well done! You have stacked %sats% sats on your account %account%.
Here is an overview of your order:

Bitcoin to receive:		%bitcoin% BTC
Address Description:	%addressdesc%



Vires in Numeris!
